name: Montecinema
description: Feature-rich full-stack application for a cinema, providing users with comprehensive access to upcoming screenings and currently available movies. The application allows users to create accounts and book tickets seamlessly. Additionally, it includes a dedicated section for staff, enabling efficient management of bookings and customer interactions
